page.title: 18CHANGES IN CRADLEY
page.content: {THE NEW INN}On the road above Kings Bridge is a house that used to be an inn.25 years ago it was called the New Inn.The front of the house is Georgian,the back is black and white. A married couple ran the inn for the brewery.The name of the inn was changed to "The Stable" and a new inn sign hung up.Later the brewery decided to close the inn.The house was sold and it is a private house today. {BROOKSIDE}This was the first development after the water supply and the sewage system were put in.The field was used for cows to graze in and later was sold to a builder who sold it as a building plot.8 bungalows were built.20 foot trees were put in (Weeping Willow,Horse Chestnut,Conifers and Oaks).
